titles: Golden epistles contayning varietie of discourse both morall, philosophicall, and diuine: gathered as well out of the remaynder of Gueuaraes workes, as other authors, Latine, French, and Italian. By Geffray Fenton.
author: Fenton, Geoffrey, Sir, 1539?-1608.
Guevara, Antonio de, Bp., d. 1545?
publisher: By Henry Middelton, for Rafe Newbery, dwelling in Fleetestreat a litle aboue the Conduit,
notes: Often found bound with an edition of Guevara's "Familiar epistles".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Conduct of life --  Early works to 1900.
